activities: Airbus DS Communications provides proprietary notification solutions and services to both governmental and commercial end users. The information stored on the solution is selected and saved at the discretion of the end user in accordance with the Airbus DS Communications license agreement and call flows and notifications are also created by end users to their intended recipients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Any complaints regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the Cassidian Communications Chief Compliance Officer at the address given above. Cassidian Communications will investigate and attempt to resolve issues regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy. For complaints that cannot be resolved with the customer, Cassidian Communications agrees to participate in third party dispute resolution procedures by the American Arbitration Association
